          "properties": {
            "title": [
              ["This is only required once. The "],
              ["virtualenv", [["c"]]],
              [
                " program may be available through your distribution. On Debian-like distributions, the package is called "
              ],
              ["python-virtualenv", [["c"]]],
              [" or "],
              ["python3-virtualenv", [["c"]]],
              ["."]

          "parent_id": "a53111b1-730c-403c-9078-9859f855547a",
          "parent_table": "block",
          "properties": {
            "title": [
              ["Please note that "],
              ["freeze", [["c"]]],
              [
                " lists all the modules, including the transitive dependencies required by the top-level modules you installed manually. As such, you may prefer to "
              ],
              [
                "craft the ",
                [
                  [
                    "a",
                    "https://pip.pypa.io/en/stable/reference/pip_install/#example-requirements-file"
                  ]
                ]
              ],
              [
                "requirements.txt",
                [
                  ["c"],
                  [
                    "a",
                    "https://pip.pypa.io/en/stable/reference/pip_install/#example-requirements-file"
                  ]
                ]
              ],
              [
                " file by hand",
                [
                  [
                    "a",
                    "https://pip.pypa.io/en/stable/reference/pip_install/#example-requirements-file"
                  ]
                ]
              ],
              [", by putting only the top-level modules you need."]
            ]
          },
          "space_id": "cf9fa7dd-b245-42a0-b929-d5a276b3afe0",
          "type": "text",
          "version": 1
        }
      },
